languages.text: {n}Взгляд девушки испуганно мечется, при этом явно избегая обреченных на помосте.{/n} "Я... слишком низкорожденная, чтобы брать на себя бремя быть судией, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}..."

{n}Maive's gaze darts fearfully around while visibly avoiding the doomed mutants on the platform.{/n} "I am... of too low a birth to take on the burden of being a judge, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд девушки испуганно мечется, при этом явно избегая обреченных на помосте.{/n} "Я... слишком низкорожденная, чтобы брать на себя бремя быть судией, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}..."

languages.text: {n}梅芙一脸惊恐地环顾四周，目光避开了行刑台上两个注定难逃一劫的变种人。{/n}“来自上界的大人啊，我……我出身低微……无法担当审判者的重任……”
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's gaze darts fearfully around while visibly avoiding the doomed mutants on the platform.{/n} "I am... of too low a birth to take on the burden of being a judge, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙一脸惊恐地环顾四周，目光避开了行刑台上两个注定难逃一劫的变种人。{/n}“来自上界的大人啊，我……我出身低微……无法担当审判者的重任……”

languages.text: {n}Maive lanza miradas temerosas de aquí para allá, evitando claramente a los reos mutantes que aguardan sobre la plataforma.{/n} «Soy... de muy baja cuna para asumir las responsabilidades de un juicio, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial...».
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's gaze darts fearfully around while visibly avoiding the doomed mutants on the platform.{/n} "I am... of too low a birth to take on the burden of being a judge, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive lanza miradas temerosas de aquí para allá, evitando claramente a los reos mutantes que aguardan sobre la plataforma.{/n} «Soy... de muy baja cuna para asumir las responsabilidades de un juicio, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial...».

languages.text: {n}Maive'in bakışları, platformdaki ölüme mahkûm edilmiş mutantlardan net bir şekilde kaçınıyor.{/n} "Ben... Yargıçlık yükünü üstlenemeyecek kadar alt tabakadanım Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}..."
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's gaze darts fearfully around while visibly avoiding the doomed mutants on the platform.{/n} "I am... of too low a birth to take on the burden of being a judge, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive'in bakışları, platformdaki ölüme mahkûm edilmiş mutantlardan net bir şekilde kaçınıyor.{/n} "Ben... Yargıçlık yükünü üstlenemeyecek kadar alt tabakadanım Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}..."

languages.text: {n}メイヴの視線は恐れてそわそわと動くが、台の上の運の尽きた変異体を明らかに避けている。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}、私は卑しい生まれですので、判決の重荷を引き受けることができません…」
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's gaze darts fearfully around while visibly avoiding the doomed mutants on the platform.{/n} "I am... of too low a birth to take on the burden of being a judge, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴの視線は恐れてそわそわと動くが、台の上の運の尽きた変異体を明らかに避けている。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}、私は卑しい生まれですので、判決の重荷を引き受けることができません…」

languages.text: {n}Maive darde des regards apeurés à la ronde tout en évitant soigneusement de croiser celui des mutants condamnés alignés sur l'échafaud.{/n} « Je suis... de trop modeste extraction pour assumer d'aussi hautes responsabilités que celles d'un juge, ô Votre Céleste Seigneurie... »
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's gaze darts fearfully around while visibly avoiding the doomed mutants on the platform.{/n} "I am... of too low a birth to take on the burden of being a judge, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive darde des regards apeurés à la ronde tout en évitant soigneusement de croiser celui des mutants condamnés alignés sur l'échafaud.{/n} « Je suis... de trop modeste extraction pour assumer d'aussi hautes responsabilités que celles d'un juge, ô Votre Céleste Seigneurie... »

languages.text: {n}Maives Blick huscht verängstigt umher, meidet aber die verurteilten Mutanten.{/n} "Ich bin ... von zu niederer Geburt, um die Bürde zu tragen, Richterin zu sein, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin} ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's gaze darts fearfully around while visibly avoiding the doomed mutants on the platform.{/n} "I am... of too low a birth to take on the burden of being a judge, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}..."
